attributes.action: Cancel second homes and hire hotel rooms
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the ability for MP's to claim for second homes. They have their homes in their constituency which they can not claim for on expenses and if they are sitting in the Houses of Parliament then they can stay in a hotel with a maximum expense limit.
The expense limit would be there to protect HM Treasury and the public from abuse.
This would make the government run more like a normal business. It will also stop the ongoing abuse of the expense system.
